name: SqueezeTrainer
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: squeeze trainer
des:
This skill provides guidance and timers to help you with pelvic floor exercises. The pelvic floor is the group of muscles found around the pelvis which help control your bladder and bowel. Problems can occur with these muscles due to pregnancy, childbirth, being overweight, constipation, post surgery, or from other medical problems. These muscles can be strengthened, however this must be done regularly to work effectively. 

By using Squeeze Trainer you can ensure you perform the exercises correctly and frequently. You can use a standard exercise plan or setup a custom plan with daily reminders.

Disclaimer:
This skill provides information on the benefits of pelvic floor exercises. It does not provide medical advice and is for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. If you’ve any medical concerns, please seek advice from a medical professional about your health before undertaking any fitness exercises.

This skill uses Alexa Shopping to make purchases on Amazon. Alexa allows purchasing by voice using your default payment and shipping settings. You can set a voice confirmation code, turn off purchasing, and see product and order details in your Alexa app.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
